text: Nimen feng zhenzhu de mingling er jianmie di jun zhi chu, zhenzhu que yi dui nimen shijian ta de yue yan; zhidaole zai ta shi nimen kanjian nimen suo xi'ai de zhanlipin zhihou, nimen jing shiruo, nei zheng, weikang (shizhe de) mingling. Nimen zhong you tanlian jinshi de, you qitu houshi de. Sihou, ta shi nimen likai diren, yibian ta shiyan nimen. Ta que yi raoshu nimen. Zhenzhu duiyu xinshi shi you enhui de.
